definition: bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
the Bronze Age/also written 青銅時代|青铜时代[Qing1 tong2 Shi2 dai4]

sentences.english: Dragon pattern is the main manifestation of ornamentations on bronze in the period of Shang to early western Zhou.
sentences.chinese: 龍紋是商周時期青銅器裝飾藝術的一大主題。

sentences.english: The motifs are classic Chinese ones that are variations on themes that go all the way back to Zhou dynasty bronzes .
sentences.chinese: 圖案是典型的中國式，以周朝青銅器上的圖案爲遠祖。

sentences.english: The more alkaline of the soil is, the more serious corrosion on the bronze.
sentences.chinese: 偏鹼性土壤中，鹼性越強對青銅器的腐蝕越嚴重。

sentences.english: Simple and plain bronze locks appeared in the Bronze Age.
sentences.chinese: 簡單的銅鎖出現於青銅器時代。

sentences.english: The Simuwu Great Tripod is China's biggest piece of bronze ware.
sentences.chinese: 我國最大的青銅器是司母戊大方鼎。

sentences.english: The Simuwu Rectangle Ding is China's biggest piece of bronze ware.
sentences.chinese: 我國最大的青銅器是司母戊大方鼎。

sentences.english: During the Goryeo period the use of bronze was advanced.
sentences.chinese: 在高麗王朝，青銅器的使用得到推廣進步。

sentences.english: The main manufacture technology of ancient Chinese bronzes was piece-mould casting, the framework of which has not been established yet.
sentences.chinese: 中國青銅時代鑄造的青銅器主要是採用範鑄法生產的。

sentences.english: Shang dynasty is the golden period for the development of dragon patterns on bronze.
sentences.chinese: 殷商是青銅器龍紋發展的黃金時期。

sentences.english: Yinxu is well know for bronzes, jades, and inscribed oracle bones unearthed from the site.
sentences.chinese: 遺址出土的青銅器，玉器，甲骨卜辭舉世聞名。

sentences.english: As early as 3,600 years ago, bronze objects were already made in China.
sentences.chinese: 早在三千六百多年前，中國就已經有青銅器了。

sentences.english: The pre-Qin days were China's bronze age.
sentences.chinese: 時期是我國的青銅器時代。

sentences.english: Second is the sacrifice ceremony of the bronze sacrifice vessels unearthed from the hoard of bronze.
sentences.chinese: 二是青銅器窖藏中出土青銅禮器反映出的祭祀儀式。

sentences.english: Weeks the birthplace of the qin dynasty, famous bronze of the township.
sentences.chinese: 周秦王朝的發祥地，著名的青銅器之鄉。

sentences.english: In ancient China, Shang Dynasty teemed with the bronzes.
sentences.chinese: 在中國古代，商朝生產青銅器。

definition: handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
bronze (alloy of copper 銅|铜 and tin 錫|锡[xi1])
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
bamboo writing slips in ancient times (joined together to form whole scrolls)
